Adding devices manually Please turn on the Bluetooth Please keep the mobile phone close to the device and router, and keep the network normal-Fi Retry step by step Network provisioning success Facing the QR code directly to the camera, keep a distance of 15-20cm Scan failed... What should I do if the scan fails? Probably due to the current network environment is poor or has been bind by others. 1. Make sure the distance between the phone and the device is close enough and there is no strong interference in the surrounding network environment. 2. Make sure the location permission of the app is open. 3. If you still can\'t find the device, it may be because the device has been bind by someone else. If you are not sure who has bound the device, you can reset it, please refer to the manual or select "manually add" device in the app and follow the guide. 4. Bluetooth devices, please check whether the device is normally powered on, or phone Bluetooth has been opened. Enter your password Device Information Select the room Connect WI-Fi Find a device Bind device Register to the cloud Device initialisation Continue adding What if I can\'t scan? Unconfigured pairing guide 1. Please connect your phone to the hotspot shown in the picture below 2. Return to this application and continue to add devices. If the local network permission is not enabled, the device will fail to connect to the network Make sure the connection to the hotspot is correct, continue to the next step Reconnect
